title: Can't Log into my League Account
body: So I had this pc for maybe 6 months now and this never happened to me before.. so I have been trying to fix this problem for the past few days.. what happens is that whenever I attemt to log in, the network problem window pops up and when I click ok the league client closes.. recently I tried logging in again and it's leaving me with logging in but nothing happens.. the one time I actually managed to log in it disconnected me from chat and pvp server and then I have to sit down and wait for it to just close cause I can't even click anything. I don't know how this happened.. I felt like a game of league and tried out the new game mode.. after I finished the game I left the client open and just went to watch a couple of videos to chill.. all of a sudden I got disconnected from chat and pvp and since sometimes it happens I just waited a bit until everything is back to normal.. but what happened was that I couldn't connect back to chat or pvp so I just closed the client.. after that I started having these problems. What's going on? is there anything I can do? Also I tried the repair thingy before logging in and it's still doing the same.

replies.body: It sounds like you are experiencing a pretty weak connection issue to our server that is unstable or doesn't connect at all.  Hopefully, the troubleshoot connection guide will fix this up.  Please let us know if you have any questions or issues.

For connection issues you'll want to perform the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that works out for you.
